posts.error_message:
Failed to publish post: Instagram cannot access the media URL (error 9004/2207052).
This usually means:
1) The URL is not publicly accessible
2) The server is blocking Instagram's bot/crawler
3) The URL is returning HTML instead of the media file
4) The server requires authentication or has CORS restrictions

SOLUTION: Ensure the URL is publicly accessible via HTTPS.
For your own server, set BASE_URL to your public domain.

URL: https://veilforce.com/uploads/batch/d9368fed-0a17-42bb-8684-8c62627f377e/day_09.jpg
Original error: InstagramAPIError: OAuthException: Only photo or video can be accepted as media type. (code: 9004) (code: 9004) (code: 9004, subcode: 2207052)

Failed to publish post: Media URL returned status 404 instead of 200. This means Instagram's crawler cannot access the URL. Check: 1) File exists on server, 2) Apache is proxying /uploads/ correctly, 3) File permissions allow read access. Failed to publish post: Instagram cannot access the media URL (error 100/2207067).
This usually means:
1) The URL is not publicly accessible
2) The server is blocking Instagram's bot/crawler
3) The URL is returning HTML instead of the media file
4) The server requires authentication or has CORS restrictions

SOLUTION for VIDEO posts:

✅ OPTION 1: Use your own server (recommended)
1) Upload the file using 'Upload file' in InstaForge
2) Set BASE_URL (or APP_URL) to your public HTTPS domain
3) Ensure your server is publicly accessible
4) The upload URL will be served from your server

✅ OPTION 2: Use external hosting (if own server not available)
1) Upload to Cloudinary, AWS S3, or Firebase Storage
2) Copy the direct HTTPS URL
3) Use 'Post by URL' and paste the URL

❌ DO NOT USE:
• Cloudflare tunnels (trycloudflare.com) - unreliable
• Ngrok - unreliable
• Localhost URLs - Instagram cannot access them

URL: https://through-queue-forty-roles.trycloudflare.com/uploads/c45ef399-30ee-4884-81f9-7143bf1cfc40.mp4
Original error: InstagramAPIError: OAuthException: Invalid parameter (code: 100) (code: 100) (code: 100, subcode: 2207067)
